thread.section_title: NamasteVapes Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NamasteVapes Australia | namastevaporizers.com.au
thread.title: Tanya

author: Tanya
title: Tanya
text: Was so impressed with the customer service. I placed an order which was for a gift for a friend I'm visiting overseas and was worried that it wouldn't get to me on time before my flight. I sent an email asking for special consideration. Within 30 minutes I got a response via email saying that they would have it despatched the next morning, I then received a phone call the next day to update me on the status of the despatch so I would have peace of mind. They went above and beyond and I received my order heaps quicker than expected. Thanks guys!
